stimulusHtml: Which of the following contexts is most helpful for understanding the creation of this document?

features.html:
Library of Congress, Mamma Haidara Commemorative Library

This source was written to train scholars in the field of astronomy and includes explanations written in Arabic, the primary language of Islam.

choicesHtml: Southern African kingdoms constructed monumental architecture.
Egypt was one of the world’s earliest complex, large-scale societies.
The Aksumite Empire developed a written language.
Trade cities in West Africa were centers of learning.
